meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Council Briefing Room 6ES and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the President.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Attendance check conducted by the Housing Project Manager.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes for the November 14, 2023 meeting.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Resolutions for the Estates at Ferguson
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt partnership resolutions for financing and construction of the Estates at Ferguson.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: 2024 Annual Budget
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt the Corporation’s 2024 Annual Budget.

agenda_items.title: Treasurer’s Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Dallas HFC Treasurer’s report.

agenda_items.title: Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report.
